MESSAGE.EN: Back when Kurugaya-san did ❛that thing,❜ she was one of those who raised a voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Back when Kurugaya-san did ❛that thing,❜ she was one of those who raised a voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下に恭介が通りかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke came walking down the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke came walking down the corridor.

MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝......?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝......?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 杉並さんは恭介を見て、萎縮したようになる。
MESSAGE.EN: She shrunk back when she caught sight of Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shrunk back when she caught sight of Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「…話なら、放課後に教室で聞きます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝...If you want to talk to me, I'll hear you out after school in the classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝...If you want to talk to me, I'll hear you out after school in the classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「じゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Bye...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Bye...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 杉並さんは廊下を歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She took off along the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took off along the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだ、あいつになんか用だったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What was that, did you have some business with her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What was that, did you have some business with her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…恭介、今回はタイミング悪いよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... That was bad timing on your part this time, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... That was bad timing on your part this time, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それはすまなかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry for that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm sorry for that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…犯人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She's the perpetrator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She's the perpetrator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「話し合いしてみようと思ったんだよ。何で来ヶ谷さんに嫌がらせするのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wanted to talk it over with her. To ask her why she's harassing Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wanted to talk it over with her. To ask her why she's harassing Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なるほどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「しかし、今のやつが犯人か…人は見掛けによらないとは言うが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But, it's hard to believe she's the perp... It's as they say, you shouldn't judge people by their looks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But, it's hard to believe she's the perp... It's as they say, you shouldn't judge people by their looks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「確かにね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝True...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝True...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「で、放課後なわけだな。一応ついていってやろうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, you have to wait until classes are over. Should I come with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, you have to wait until classes are over. Should I come with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それはダメじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that won't do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that won't do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こっちがみんなをぞろぞろ連れてったら話し合いにならないかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I bring everyone with me, we won't be able to have a proper discussion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I bring everyone with me, we won't be able to have a proper discussion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…いいのか、ひとりで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Will you be okay by yourself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Will you be okay by yourself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「杉並さんだけなら、まあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if it's just Suginami-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if it's just Suginami-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …我ながら情けない話だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I honestly felt quite pathetic.
MESSAGE.Translation: I honestly felt quite pathetic.

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後。
MESSAGE.EN: After school.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまずジュースを買いに行き、教室から人がいなくなるのを待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to buy some juice while waiting for everyone to leave the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to buy some juice while waiting for everyone to leave the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（そろそろいいかな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(It's about time...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(It's about time...)

MESSAGE.JP: 空き缶をゴミ箱に投げ、教室に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I threw away the empty can and returned to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I threw away the empty can and returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（よく考えたら、他のふたりを杉並さんが連れてくる可能性もあるんだよなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Now that I think of it, there's a good chance that those two will be there together with her...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Now that I think of it, there's a good chance that those two will be there together with her...)

MESSAGE.JP: そうなったら、どうしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do if that happens?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do if that happens?

MESSAGE.JP: しょうがない、その時はみんなを呼ぼう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I'd have no choice but to call everyone...
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I'd have no choice but to call everyone...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ホントに、情けないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm just so pathetic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm just so pathetic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自嘲気味に呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I muttered in self-admonishment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I muttered in self-admonishment.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I was back at the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was back at the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 中にいるのは、どうやら杉並さんひとりのようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Suginami-san was alone inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suginami-san was alone inside.

MESSAGE.JP: …ちょっと安心する。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I felt relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I felt relief.

MESSAGE.JP: 中に入ると、席に座っていた杉並さんが立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: When Suginami-san noticed me entering, she got to her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: When Suginami-san noticed me entering, she got to her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「直枝君…話って、なんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Naoe-kun... What did you want to talk about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Naoe-kun... What did you want to talk about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大体わかってると思うんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you should know already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you should know already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 杉並さんはうつむく。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked down.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やめてくれないかな、ああいう悪質な真似」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Won't you stop already? It's not funny anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Won't you stop already? It's not funny anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「…やっぱり、来ヶ谷さんのことですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝...So, it's about Kurugaya-san after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝...So, it's about Kurugaya-san after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ、そうなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you could say that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you could say that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「他のふたりのことも知ってる。三人でやったんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know about the other two. You did it together, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know about the other two. You did it together, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「そうです…ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Yes... I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Yes... I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …頭を下げてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謝られても困るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, what do you expect me to say to that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, what do you expect me to say to that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうか、謝るくらいなら最初からしないでよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, if you feel sorry, you shouldn't have done it in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, if you feel sorry, you shouldn't have done it in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …杉並さんは相変わらず、申し訳なさそうな顔で俯いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was still hanging her head with an apologetic expression on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was still hanging her head with an apologetic expression on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: その姿を見てると、だんだん腹が立ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing her like that was just making me more and more irritated.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing her like that was just making me more and more irritated.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だいたい、来ヶ谷さんが何をしたってのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Besides, what has she ever done to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Besides, what has she ever done to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの人、そんなことされなきゃいけないような人じゃないだろっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Was it really necessary to put her through all that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Was it really necessary to put her through all that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「……じゃないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝......nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝......nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まくし立てる僕に、ぼそり、と呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept throwing words at her, when she muttered quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept throwing words at her, when she muttered quietly.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「直枝君には、来ヶ谷さんのことなんて関係ないじゃないですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Naoe-kun, no matter what happens to Kurugaya-san, it has nothing to do with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Naoe-kun, no matter what happens to Kurugaya-san, it has nothing to do with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「なんでそんなに来ヶ谷さんのことを庇うんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Why do you go to such lengths to stick up for her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Why do you go to such lengths to stick up for her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり話通じない人なのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like my words didn't get through to her at all...
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like my words didn't get through to her at all...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕まで巻き込んでおいて、いまさら関係ないって何だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First you get me involved and then you tell me it has nothing to do with me, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First you get me involved and then you tell me it has nothing to do with me, huh...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もういいよ。とにかく謝るくらいならもう二度としないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Never mind. If you feel sorry, just don't ever do it again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Never mind. If you feel sorry, just don't ever do it again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「待ってください、直枝君を巻きこんだって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Please wait, what's that about getting you involved...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Please wait, what's that about getting you involved...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこで話の食い違いに気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: It was then that I realized we'd been talking about different things.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was then that I realized we'd been talking about different things.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…だから、僕の下駄箱に色々仕掛けてきたでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... Well, didn't you put all that stuff in my locker?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... Well, didn't you put all that stuff in my locker?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「し、知りませんそんなことっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Th-this is news to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Th-this is news to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「え…？　直枝君の下駄箱に…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Eh...? In Naoe-kun's locker...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Eh...? In Naoe-kun's locker...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、妙なことになってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was getting complicated.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was getting complicated.

MESSAGE.JP: どうも、本当に知らないみたいだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It really seemed like she'd heard nothing of it...
MESSAGE.Translation: It really seemed like she'd heard nothing of it...

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「すみません、ちょっと待ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝I'm sorry, please wait just a bit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝I'm sorry, please wait just a bit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 杉並さんは携帯電話を取り出すと、電話を掛け始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took out her cellphone and started making a call.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took out her cellphone and started making a call.

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、拍子抜けというかなんというか。
MESSAGE.EN: This was all somehow really anticlimactic.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was all somehow really anticlimactic.

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「え…ちょっとまって、知らないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Eh... Hold on, I hadn't heard about that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Eh... Hold on, I hadn't heard about that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何か揉めてるみたいだ。ひとまず、電話が終わるのを待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like they were having an argument. I could only wait for them to finish.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like they were having an argument. I could only wait for them to finish.

MESSAGE.JP: …僕は一つ息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「今どこ…？　え、すぐ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Where are you now...? Huh, right here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Where are you now...? Huh, right here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 杉並さんが顔を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろを向くと、二人の女生徒が教室に入ってきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned my head, and there were two girls coming inside the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned my head, and there were two girls coming inside the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「来てあげたけど、何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝We're here, what now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝We're here, what now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「めんどくさい話ならすぐ済ませて欲しいんだけどー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝This is such a bother, I seriously want to get it over with quick.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝This is such a bother, I seriously want to get it over with quick.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …グループの残りのふたり、高宮と勝沢だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They were the remaining two members of the group, Takamiya and Katsuzawa.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They were the remaining two members of the group, Takamiya and Katsuzawa.

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「ねえ、直枝君に嫌がらせって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝What's that thing about harassing Naoe-kun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝What's that thing about harassing Naoe-kun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「は？　嫌がらせ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Huh? Harassment?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Huh? Harassment?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「知ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝You know something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝You know something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `勝沢@「何それ、しらなーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Katsuzawa@❝The hell if I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Katsuzawa@❝The hell if I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「え？　直枝君イジメに遭ってるの？　へえたいへんだねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Eh? Someone's bullying Naoe-kun? My God, how terrible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Eh? Someone's bullying Naoe-kun? My God, how terrible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …こいつらだ。間違いなくこいつらだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was them. There was no doubt about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was them. There was no doubt about it.

MESSAGE.JP: ばれてないとでも思ってるのか、わざとらしい演技は続く。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps believing that their antics hadn't come to light yet, they just went on with their unnatural act.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps believing that their antics hadn't come to light yet, they just went on with their unnatural act.

MESSAGE.JP: `勝沢@「あー、ひょっとして来ヶ谷の仕業じゃなーい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Katsuzawa@❝Ah, maybe it's Kurugaya's doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Katsuzawa@❝Ah, maybe it's Kurugaya's doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「あ、そうかも。あいつさー、知ってる？　前に私たちの下駄箱に盗聴器とか仕掛けてんの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Oh, I'm sure it's her. You know what she did? She even planted listening devices in our lockers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Oh, I'm sure it's her. You know what she did? She even planted listening devices in our lockers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「犯罪だよね犯罪。マジしんじらんねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝It's a crime, it's totally a crime. Seriously, what was she thinking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝It's a crime, it's totally a crime. Seriously, what was she thinking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `勝沢@「じゃあもう来ヶ谷で決定じゃなーい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Katsuzawa@❝So, it's settled, it's totally her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Katsuzawa@❝So, it's settled, it's totally her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「うんうんマジそうだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Yeah, for sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Yeah, for sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ふざけんなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't give me that crap.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't give me that crap.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おまえらだろっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's you two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's you two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `勝沢@「だから知らないっていってるじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Katsuzawa@❝I said I don't know anything about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Katsuzawa@❝I said I don't know anything about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「杉並さんから聞いたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I heard it from Suginami-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I heard it from Suginami-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おまえらと一緒に来ヶ谷さんに嫌がらせしてるって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That you were harassing Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That you were harassing Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう全部知ってるんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「なにそれ？　ああ、むつそんなことやったんだ、へー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝What the hell? Mutsu, were you doing those kind of things?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝What the hell? Mutsu, were you doing those kind of things?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Eh...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Eh...!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「来ヶ谷がムカつくのわかるけどさー、私たちまで巻き込まないでよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝I can understand why Kurugaya would piss you off, but keep us out of this, will you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝I can understand why Kurugaya would piss you off, but keep us out of this, will you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は、杉並さんに全部の罪をなすりつけようとしている…。
MESSAGE.EN: They were now trying to shift all the blame to Suginami-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: They were now trying to shift all the blame to Suginami-san...

MESSAGE.JP: `勝沢@「むつって見た目に似合わずこわーい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Katsuzawa@❝Mutsu may not look it, but she can be so scary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Katsuzawa@❝Mutsu may not look it, but she can be so scary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `勝沢@「もう近寄んないでねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Katsuzawa@❝Stay away from us, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Katsuzawa@❝Stay away from us, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「そ、そんなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Ho-how can you say that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Ho-how can you say that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「ひどいよ、やろうって言ったのふたりじゃないっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝You're horrible, wasn't it your idea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝You're horrible, wasn't it your idea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は杉並さんのほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Suginami-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Suginami-san.

MESSAGE.JP: …杉並さんは、泣きそうな表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was about to break into tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was about to break into tears.

MESSAGE.JP: この人も被害者なのかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps she was also a victim herself...
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps she was also a victim herself...

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「知らないって言ってんだろ。巻き込まないでくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝I told you I have no clue. Won't you keep us out of this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝I told you I have no clue. Won't you keep us out of this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいかげんにしろよっ！　もうこっちは全部わかってるんだからなっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Cut the crap already! I have already figured out everything!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Cut the crap already! I have already figured out everything!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「は？　しょーこあんのかよしょーこ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Huh? Oh yeah, and where's your proof?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Huh? Oh yeah, and where's your proof?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「センセーたちにでも言いつければ？　私たちは知らないって言えば、そこでおしまいだと思うけどさー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Why don't you tell the teachers on us? If we tell them we have no idea, it'll be over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Why don't you tell the teachers on us? If we tell them we have no idea, it'll be over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …開き直った。
MESSAGE.EN: She was taking an aggressive stance.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was taking an aggressive stance.

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に。
MESSAGE.EN: Then suddenly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then suddenly.

MESSAGE.JP: 『ざ…ざざ…』
スピーカーから雑音。
MESSAGE.EN: The speakers burst to life.
MESSAGE.Translation: The speakers burst to life.

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『…誰もいない？　だいじょーぶ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[...Is everybody gone? Can we start?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[...Is everybody gone? Can we start?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『あれー来ヶ谷の番号ってどれだっけー？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Hey, what number was Kurugaya's?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Hey, what number was Kurugaya's?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『あんたの二つ下だよ、バカだね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[The second below yours, stupid.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[The second below yours, stupid.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『あー、こんな近かったんだー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Oh, it was that close, huh.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Oh, it was that close, huh.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声３@『あの…ホントにまたやるの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 3@[Um... Are we really doing it?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 3@[Um... Are we really doing it?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『全然堪えてないじゃん、あいつさー。もう上履き燃やしちゃおうか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[She puts up with anything, doesn't she. Why don't we just burn her shoes?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[She puts up with anything, doesn't she. Why don't we just burn her shoes?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『あはははそれさいこー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Ahahaha, that'd be awesome.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Ahahaha, that'd be awesome.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声３@『それはやりすぎじゃ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 3@[Aren't we going overboard...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 3@[Aren't we going overboard...]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『んじゃ…これで』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Hmm... Done.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Hmm... Done.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『え？　なにそんなこと書いていいの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Eh? Is it really okay to write that?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Eh? Is it really okay to write that?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『うそうそ、まだあまいっしょ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Just kidding, that's not enough.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Just kidding, that's not enough.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『あんたも書きなよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[You write something, too.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[You write something, too.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声３@『え…私は、いいよ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 3@[Eh... No, I don't want to...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 3@[Eh... No, I don't want to...]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『あはは、ていうかもう書くとこないわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Ahaha, actually there's no more room to write.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Ahaha, actually there's no more room to write.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『こりゃさすがにひどいねー。私だったら泣いちゃうねー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[That should do it. If someone did that to me, I'd definitely cry.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[That should do it. If someone did that to me, I'd definitely cry.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『まあ、こんくらいやれば懲りるんじゃない？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Well, that should teach her, I guess?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Well, that should teach her, I guess?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『調子こき過ぎましたすみませんってさー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[She'll come crying to us and apologize for being so haughty.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[She'll come crying to us and apologize for being so haughty.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『あはははは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Ahahaha.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Ahahaha.]

MESSAGE.JP: …胸糞の悪くなる会話が流れた。
MESSAGE.EN: A sickening conversation was broadcast.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sickening conversation was broadcast.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「以上、貴様らの言う証拠とやらを突きつけてみたわけだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And that will serve as proof of what you fools did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And that will serve as proof of what you fools did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…何か言うことは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Is there something you wish to add?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Is there something you wish to add?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声のするほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to the voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to the voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが教室のドアに背をもたれ、そこにいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There she stood, leaning on the door. Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: There she stood, leaning on the door. Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「は…ちょ、これ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Ha... Wha-, this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Ha... Wha-, this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「は…ちょ、これ…か。どこの国の言葉だ？　私の解り得る７ヶ国の言語のどれかで話してくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝❛Ha... Wha-, this❜ What language is that? Why don't you talk in one of the seven languages I know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝❛Ha... Wha-, this❜ What language is that? Why don't you talk in one of the seven languages I know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「出来れば日本語がいい。貴様らに話せれば、だがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If possible, in Japanese. That is, if you fools can even speak it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If possible, in Japanese. That is, if you fools can even speak it.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Katsuzawa@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Katsuzawa@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二人が顔面を蒼白にして押し黙る。
MESSAGE.EN: The color drained from the pair's faces as they fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: The color drained from the pair's faces as they fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、今ので主犯格はふたり、ひとりはその場に居合わせただけで実行犯には加わっていないことが判る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I do understand that only two of you were actually committing the crime, while one of you was only present at the scene.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, I do understand that only two of you were actually committing the crime, while one of you was only present at the scene.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…止めようともしない時点で同罪だがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...But doing nothing to stop them is a crime in itself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...But doing nothing to stop them is a crime in itself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、そろそろ次が流れる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it's about time the next part started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it's about time the next part started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 再び、スピーカーから声。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again, voices were coming from the PA system.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again, voices were coming from the PA system.

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『…バカ、こっちだって』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[...Stupid, this way.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[...Stupid, this way.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『えー？　あー、今度も来ヶ谷じゃないのー？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Eh? Ah, we're not going for Kurugaya this time?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Eh? Ah, we're not going for Kurugaya this time?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『何度説明させんだよ。あいつ頭おかしいって。バラされたらまずいし』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[How many times have I explained already? She's messed up in the head. If she finds out, we'll be in for some trouble.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[How many times have I explained already? She's messed up in the head. If she finds out, we'll be in for some trouble.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『大体さ、あんなロボットみたいなやつが友達作れんのがおかしいんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Besides, it doesn't make sense that a robot like her could make a friend.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Besides, it doesn't make sense that a robot like her could make a friend.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『しかも男だよ男』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[And a guy, no less.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[And a guy, no less.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『でもさー、直枝にやったらむつが怒るんじゃない？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[But, if we do it to Naoe, won't Mutsu be mad?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[But, if we do it to Naoe, won't Mutsu be mad?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『いいんだよ、こいつが一番弱そうだし、女子にやったら騒がれまくるし』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[It's okay, he's the weakest of the bunch. If we did it to a girl, they'd make a fuss.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[It's okay, he's the weakest of the bunch. If we did it to a girl, they'd make a fuss.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『うえー、男子の下駄箱ってくさーい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Damn, guys' lockers stink so much.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Damn, guys' lockers stink so much.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『ちょうどいいよ、そのアンパンぶっこんで』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Throw that anpan in as well.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Throw that anpan in as well.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『え？　やばくないそれ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Eh? Isn't that seriously bad?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Eh? Isn't that seriously bad?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『ちょっとゴミ持ってくる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[I'll go bring some garbage.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[I'll go bring some garbage.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『おおーそれもひどいねー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Ooh, that's so mean.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Ooh, that's so mean.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『バカつ沢、声がでかい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Not so loud, Stupidzawa.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Not so loud, Stupidzawa.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『バカバカ言わないでよ、もー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Geez, don't call me stupid.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Geez, don't call me stupid.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『あはははは、マジやばくない？　なにこの下駄箱っ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Ahahaha, isn't it hysterical? Look at that locker.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Ahahaha, isn't it hysterical? Look at that locker.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『これじゃただのゴミ箱だねー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[It's nothing but a trash bin now.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[It's nothing but a trash bin now.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『昨日とか平気で来ヶ谷と話してやがったからなー、まあ、こんくらいになればわかるっしょ直枝も』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[Yesterday, he was talking with Kurugaya as if nothing'd happened, but that should clue him in.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[Yesterday, he was talking with Kurugaya as if nothing'd happened, but that should clue him in.]

MESSAGE.JP: `声２@『誰かきたよ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 2@[Is someone here?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 2@[Is someone here?]

MESSAGE.JP: `声１@『いいんだよ、普通にしてれば…いこうか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice 1@[It's fine, just act natural... Let's go.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice 1@[It's fine, just act natural... Let's go.]

MESSAGE.JP: …もう、何も言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That was the end of the broadcast.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That was the end of the broadcast.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「以上、悪質な嫌がらせをする、心の病んだ少女達に密着したドキュメントだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I present a documentary about a group of mentally ill girls and their hopeless attempts at harassment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I present a documentary about a group of mentally ill girls and their hopeless attempts at harassment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「教育委員会にでも提出したら、大問題になるだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It would cause a big scandal, if it ended up in the hands of the school board.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It would cause a big scandal, if it ended up in the hands of the school board.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「く…この…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Ugh... Why you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Ugh... Why you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 憎々しげにうめく。
MESSAGE.EN: She groaned with anguish.
MESSAGE.Translation: She groaned with anguish.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…すまんな理樹君。まさかここまで下衆な思考の持ち主とは思わなんだ。おかげで気付くのが遅れた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry, Riki-kun. I couldn't imagine they'd come up with something so rubbish. And because of that, I was late to notice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry, Riki-kun. I couldn't imagine they'd come up with something so rubbish. And because of that, I was late to notice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが教室のドアを閉める。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san closed the door behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san closed the door behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ…今のは犯行は二人。実行犯も二人。ご丁寧に名前まで入ってるな、バカつ沢君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well... As you can see, there are two instances of crime. And two direct perpetrators. One of them, Ms. Stupidzawa, is even named.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well... As you can see, there are two instances of crime. And two direct perpetrators. One of them, Ms. Stupidzawa, is even named.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Katsuzawa@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Katsuzawa@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「加えてだ、動機の裏も取れている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's more, your ulterior motive is as clear as day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's more, your ulterior motive is as clear as day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「去年私がやりこめた数学教師に依頼されたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That math teacher whom I dealt with last year, he made you an offer, did he not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That math teacher whom I dealt with last year, he made you an offer, did he not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…そもそも、出す課題に満点を取れば欠席を不問にする、と提案してきたのは向こうだったというのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...He proposed that, if you completed this task for him, he would turn a blind eye to your truancy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...He proposed that, if you completed this task for him, he would turn a blind eye to your truancy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「小人の思考は実に度し難い。放って置けばいいものを、わざわざ下らんプライドのために私に手を出すとは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Small people like that are beyond help. You leave them alone and they trample on your good will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Small people like that are beyond help. You leave them alone and they trample on your good will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「して、杉並君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And you, Suginami-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And you, Suginami-kun.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミは二人にそそのかされただけだな。キミにとっては理樹君と私が仲睦まじくする姿が気に食わなかった、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You were roped in by them. You couldn't stand seeing me and Riki-kun get along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You were roped in by them. You couldn't stand seeing me and Riki-kun get along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …その言い方には語弊がある気がするけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I thought there was a problem with the way she put it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I thought there was a problem with the way she put it.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だが、努力もせずに何かを為せると思うな。下らん策を弄するくらいなら、正面切って想いを伝えて玉砕しろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But don't think you can achieve anything without trying. If you have time for cheap tricks, you have time to convey your feelings, and should they not get through, accept defeat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But don't think you can achieve anything without trying. If you have time for cheap tricks, you have time to convey your feelings, and should they not get through, accept defeat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それでも諦められないなら、また何度でも玉砕すればいいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you still can't give up, then keep struggling even if the odds are overwhelming.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you still can't give up, then keep struggling even if the odds are overwhelming.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「…みんながみんな、あなたみたいに強いわけじゃないんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝...Not everyone can be strong like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝...Not everyone can be strong like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「傷つくのは誰だって怖いでしょっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝People are all afraid of getting hurt...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝People are all afraid of getting hurt...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「あなたみたいに何されても平気な人ばっかじゃない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Not everyone can stay calm no matter what happens to them, like you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Not everyone can stay calm no matter what happens to them, like you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それで他人を傷付けているような輩が何を吠える。そんなもの正当化にすらならん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Is that what someone who's hurting another should be saying? Stop justifying your actions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Is that what someone who's hurting another should be saying? Stop justifying your actions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、そんなことはどうでもいい。キミはひとまず、被害者というにもやぶさかではあるまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that doesn't matter. It's evident that you're a victim yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that doesn't matter. It's evident that you're a victim yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、どうしてくれようかこの連中」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now, what should I do with you two?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now, what should I do with you two?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …無言のまま顔を見合わせていた高宮と勝沢の二人を斜めに見る。
MESSAGE.EN: She cast a sidelong glance at Takamiya and Katsuzawa, who kept silently staring at one another.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cast a sidelong glance at Takamiya and Katsuzawa, who kept silently staring at one another.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミら二人と数学教師のやり取りは面白かったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It was quite amusing listening to your discourse with the math teacher.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It was quite amusing listening to your discourse with the math teacher.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「とりあえずその一部始終を収めた動画は、数学教師のメールアドレスに送りつけておいた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝For starters, I emailed the full video with that included to him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝For starters, I emailed the full video with that included to him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうだな、今の放送はラインを絞ってこの教室だけに流しているが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, that's right... I limited the broadcast to this classroom only, for now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, that's right... I limited the broadcast to this classroom only, for now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「お望みとあらば、全校、加えて近所の方々に強制的に聞かせて見せるが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you want, I could broadcast it for the entire school and even the people living in the vicinity to hear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you want, I could broadcast it for the entire school and even the people living in the vicinity to hear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「…やってごらんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝...Go ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝...Go ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「やってみなよ、この犯罪者」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Do that, and you'll be a criminal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Do that, and you'll be a criminal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「盗聴器の話か？　ふん、貴様らに保護すべき人権があるとは思えんがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Are you talking about the listening device? Hmph, I'm not so sure you fools are in any position to talk about rights.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Are you talking about the listening device? Hmph, I'm not so sure you fools are in any position to talk about rights.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「自衛手段としては最善であったと自負している。コンビニの監視カメラがプライバシーの侵害だと訴えられることもあるまい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It was all within the limits of self-defense. You think you can sue a convenience store for being captured on a surveillance camera?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It was all within the limits of self-defense. You think you can sue a convenience store for being captured on a surveillance camera?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それとも私の言ってることがわからんか？　二度と食いつかなければもう手出しはせん、といっているのだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Or do you not understand what I'm saying? If you back off now, I'll still let you off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Or do you not understand what I'm saying? If you back off now, I'll still let you off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「は？　あたしはあんたが気に食わないの。存在するだけで邪魔なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Huh? I can't stand your guts. The very fact of your existence pisses me off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Huh? I can't stand your guts. The very fact of your existence pisses me off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「覚えてないわけ？　去年、あんたがあたしにしたこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Don't tell me you forgot? About what you did last year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Don't tell me you forgot? About what you did last year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…サル山のサルになれと言われたことか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...When I was asked to join your pack of monkeys?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...When I was asked to join your pack of monkeys?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「あんたがいなきゃ、去年のクラスでだってもっと上手くやれたのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝If it weren't for you, things would have worked out so much better last year...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝If it weren't for you, things would have worked out so much better last year...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんのこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「サル山グループに入ることを私が断ったせいで、ボスとしての尊厳を汚されたと言っているようだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I turned down the offer to join their herd of monkeys, and it hurt her standing as the leader of the pack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I turned down the offer to join their herd of monkeys, and it hurt her standing as the leader of the pack.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうか、謙吾が去年も同じようなことがあった、って言ってたっけ。
MESSAGE.EN: Is that what Kengo referred to when he spoke of a similar thing happening last year?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is that what Kengo referred to when he spoke of a similar thing happening last year?

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…自分も欠陥だらけの人間だと思っていたが、本当に人格に欠陥がある人間に対するのは初めてだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I always thought I was full of defects myself, but this is my first time dealing with humans with truly defective personalities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I always thought I was full of defects myself, but this is my first time dealing with humans with truly defective personalities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「それが気に食わないんだよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝This is exactly what I can't stand about you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝This is exactly what I can't stand about you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 高宮が逆ギレを始める。
MESSAGE.EN: Rather than showing any sign of remorse, Takamiya was on the contrary getting mad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rather than showing any sign of remorse, Takamiya was on the contrary getting mad.

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「いいよ、やってみなよ放送。そしたら私たちだってあんたらのつるんでる連中全員潰してやる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Fine, broadcast whatever you want. But if you do, I'll make your friends' lives a living hell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Fine, broadcast whatever you want. But if you do, I'll make your friends' lives a living hell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「みんなで楽しく仲良くしてるんだよねぇ？　そんなの壊す方法いくらでもあるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝You're all such a merry bunch of friends, eh? You have NO idea how many ways there are to ruin that paradise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝You're all such a merry bunch of friends, eh? You have NO idea how many ways there are to ruin that paradise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんて事を思いつくんだ、こいつは…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The concept alone of what she was saying was completely sickening.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The concept alone of what she was saying was completely sickening.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分と思考があまりに違いすぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: The difference in our thought processes was too great.
MESSAGE.Translation: The difference in our thought processes was too great.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…それで脅してるつもりか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Am I to take that as a threat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Am I to take that as a threat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「だからさー、そっちがいくら私たちに反撃しようが、関係ないわけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Listen, what I'm saying is that no matter how many times you get back at us, it's no use.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Listen, what I'm saying is that no matter how many times you get back at us, it's no use.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「私の思い通りにならない限りこれは続く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝We won't stop until you start doing as we tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝We won't stop until you start doing as we tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「わかったらもうやめてください高宮さんって言ってみろよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝If you get it, then say ❛Please stop it, Takamiya-san❜!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝If you get it, then say ❛Please stop it, Takamiya-san❜!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「は？　きこえねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Huh? Can't hear you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Huh? Can't hear you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…すぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...ll you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...ll you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「殺すぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I will kill you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I will kill you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: In that instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: In that instant.

MESSAGE.JP: どがぁっしゃああああああああああああああああんっっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-booo――――――m*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-booo――――――m*!

MESSAGE.JP: 轟音が響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: A thunderous roaring sound filled the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: A thunderous roaring sound filled the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san...

MESSAGE.JP: ドアを蹴り。
MESSAGE.EN: ...kicked the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...kicked the door.

MESSAGE.JP: そのドアは。
MESSAGE.EN: And just like that, the door...
MESSAGE.Translation: And just like that, the door...

MESSAGE.JP: …廊下の壁に直撃し、真っ二つに割れた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...was sent flying into the corridor, splitting in half upon impact as it hit the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...was sent flying into the corridor, splitting in half upon impact as it hit the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…今のを貴様らの顔面にくれてやろうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Shall I repeat that on your faces now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Shall I repeat that on your faces now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「二度と鏡を見れない顔になるだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You will not able to look at your faces in the mirror ever again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You will not able to look at your faces in the mirror ever again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …怒っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was mad.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was mad.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが、怒っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san was mad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san was mad.

MESSAGE.JP: 高宮は口をぱくぱくさせて何かを唸っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Takamiya was flapping her mouth like a fish on dry land trying to get words out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Takamiya was flapping her mouth like a fish on dry land trying to get words out.

MESSAGE.JP: そこに、来ヶ谷さんがゆらりと歩み寄っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san slowly walked up to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san slowly walked up to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今はなんだか、殺人者になってもかまわないような気分だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Right now, I have no qualms about killing a person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Right now, I have no qualms about killing a person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…蹴りをくれて内臓ずたずたにして、口から二リットルほど血でも吹き出させてやろうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Do you wish for me to kick you so hard that two liters of blood pour out from your mouth and all your organs cease to function?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Do you wish for me to kick you so hard that two liters of blood pour out from your mouth and all your organs cease to function?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いつもは冗談で言うような台詞が、今は傍から聞いているこっちまで背筋が凍りつくような言葉に聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was always saying those things as a joke, but even though her words weren't directed at me now, I felt a chill go down my spine.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was always saying those things as a joke, but even though her words weren't directed at me now, I felt a chill go down my spine.

MESSAGE.JP: `高宮@「ひ、ひ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Takamiya@❝Eeek...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Takamiya@❝Eeek...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「貴様らから謝罪の弁を聞こうとは思わん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't expect to hear words of apology from you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't expect to hear words of apology from you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「これに恐怖を覚えたなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But if that taught you fear...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But if that taught you fear...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…二度と私に関わるな、このクズがあああああああああああっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Don't ever get involved with me again, you WORTHLESS PIECES OF SCUM!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Don't ever get involved with me again, you WORTHLESS PIECES OF SCUM!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一喝。
MESSAGE.EN: She roared out.
MESSAGE.Translation: She roared out.

MESSAGE.JP: …クズが二人、逃げるようにして教室を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: The two ❝worthless pieces of scum❞ fled running out of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two ❝worthless pieces of scum❞ fled running out of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「多少演技過剰だったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I wonder if my acting was a bit too intense.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I wonder if my acting was a bit too intense.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 即座にいつもの雰囲気に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: She immediately returned to her usual demeanor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She immediately returned to her usual demeanor.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、さっき言ったとおりだ。杉並君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it's just as I said earlier, Suginami-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it's just as I said earlier, Suginami-kun.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だが、多少は同情をする。キミに関しては何もなかったことにするから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But I can sympathize with you. I'll pretend that you haven't done anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But I can sympathize with you. I'll pretend that you haven't done anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミも、関わらないでくれるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I hope you won't get involved any more, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I hope you won't get involved any more, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「…あの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `杉並@「ご、ごめんなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Suginami@❝I-I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Suginami@❝I-I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ…わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah... It's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah... It's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 杉並さんはぺこり、と頭を下げ、教室を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Suginami-san bowed her head and left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suginami-san bowed her head and left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now then, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now then, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…あ、ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... Ye-yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... Ye-yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、目の前でとんでもないことが起こり過ぎていて、つい呆けてしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: With the unbelievable event that had just unfolded before my eyes, my mind was in turmoil.
MESSAGE.Translation: With the unbelievable event that had just unfolded before my eyes, my mind was in turmoil.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「すまなかったな、私の問題にキミを巻き込んでしまって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry. You had a rough time because of my personal problems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry. You had a rough time because of my personal problems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だが、なぜ私に相談しなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But, why didn't you talk to me about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But, why didn't you talk to me about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「初めから私に言えばすぐ解決しただろうに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you did, I'd have nipped this in the bud right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you did, I'd have nipped this in the bud right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「結局、なんか僕ひとりで抱えて、あがいてただけだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Looks like it was too much for me to handle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Looks like it was too much for me to handle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さんが変に気を遣ってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was afraid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was afraid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…バスターズに顔を出さなくなったりとかしたら、怖いじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Afraid that you'd take it the wrong way, and it'd be hard for you to stay on the team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Afraid that you'd take it the wrong way, and it'd be hard for you to stay on the team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それも要らない心配だったみたいだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But seems like I didn't have to worry about that either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But seems like I didn't have to worry about that either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分で言ってて気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally realized this once I said it myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally realized this once I said it myself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、なんだ、やっぱりあがいてただけだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahah, it really was too much for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahah, it really was too much for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉を聞くと、来ヶ谷さんはなんだか、優しい笑みを浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: At my words, a gentle smile rose on Kurugaya-san's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: At my words, a gentle smile rose on Kurugaya-san's face.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ…そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh... I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh... I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ、私もなんだかんだで感情を持っているのかもしれないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, maybe I'm capable of human emotions after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, maybe I'm capable of human emotions after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…さっき、思いっきり怒ってたじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Just now, weren't you really mad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Just now, weren't you really mad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それって感情でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wouldn't you say that's an emotion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wouldn't you say that's an emotion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、あまりにふざけたことを抜かしたからな、クズが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I couldn't stand watching them mess around anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I couldn't stand watching them mess around anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私は気に入っているんだ。今の『リトルバスターズ』という集団に属していることがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I like the fact that I'm a part of the ❛Little Busters❜ now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I like the fact that I'm a part of the ❛Little Busters❜ now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「その私の安らぎ空間を侵すなど、何人たりとも許すことは出来ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I will not forgive anyone violating this utopia of mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I will not forgive anyone violating this utopia of mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこで気付いたように口を止める。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she paused as though coming to realize something.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she paused as though coming to realize something.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうか、怒るんだな私も…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see, so I can be mad too...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see, so I can be mad too...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …思い出したくないくらい激しい怒り方だったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I must say, I really don't ever wish to see another fit of anger like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must say, I really don't ever wish to see another fit of anger like that.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…さて、これはどうしたものか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...So, what should we do with this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...So, what should we do with this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは蹴破ったドアに歩み寄る。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked to the door she had smashed earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked to the door she had smashed earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: …真っ二つになり、ガラスは砕け、あたりに破片が散乱。
MESSAGE.EN: It was split in half and there were pieces of glass scattered around.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was split in half and there were pieces of glass scattered around.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 戦慄を覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I shuddered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shuddered.

MESSAGE.JP: 余裕で人が死にそうな蹴りだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: A kick like that could've easily killed a person...
MESSAGE.Translation: A kick like that could've easily killed a person...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「しかしやはり怒りに任せるべきではないな。後先考えずにこんなことをしてしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I really shouldn't have let anger get the best of me. This happened because I wasn't thinking of the consequences.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I really shouldn't have let anger get the best of me. This happened because I wasn't thinking of the consequences.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し考え込む。
MESSAGE.EN: She contemplated for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: She contemplated for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…そうだな、真人少年を呼んできてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, right, why don't you call young man Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, right, why don't you call young man Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほら、ダッシュだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Come on, dash for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Come on, dash for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、全然わかんないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have no idea what you're planning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have no idea what you're planning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「井ノ原真人君を呼んできてくれといってるんだ。携帯も使用禁止」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm telling you to go fetch Masato Inohara - and no using your cellphone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm telling you to go fetch Masato Inohara - and no using your cellphone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ、いいけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I get it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I get it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、よい子は好きだよおねーさんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, Onee-san likes well-behaved kids.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, Onee-san likes well-behaved kids.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、わけがわからん。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't have an inkling what she was up to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't have an inkling what she was up to.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ？　来ヶ谷から呼び出し？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Kurugaya called for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Kurugaya called for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、なんかよくわかんないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, don't know why though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, don't know why though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…まあ別にいいけどよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Well, I don't mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Well, I don't mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人を連れて教室に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took Masato back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took Masato back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおお、なんじゃこりゃあっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoooh, what the hell is this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoooh, what the hell is this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ドアの惨状を見て真人が叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato yelled out after seeing the state the door was in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato yelled out after seeing the state the door was in.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ダンプカーでも突っ込んだのかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Did a dump truck go through it or something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did a dump truck go through it or something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやー、多分瞬間的な衝撃力は、それ以上だったんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I wouldn't be surprised if the impact was even greater than that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I wouldn't be surprised if the impact was even greater than that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうか来ヶ谷さんがいないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, where's Kurugaya-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, where's Kurugaya-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あぁ？　これ見せるためだけにオレ呼んだってのかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Did she call me just so I could see this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Did she call me just so I could see this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まあ珍しいもんではあるけどな、どれどれ、ふーむなるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, this is quite rare, I'll give you that. Let me see, hm... I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, this is quite rare, I'll give you that. Let me see, hm... I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 現場検証を開始する真人。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato began conducting an impromptu investigation of the scene.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato began conducting an impromptu investigation of the scene.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こいつは怪事件だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This case is a mystery...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This case is a mystery...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: と、リノリウムに響く足音が。
MESSAGE.EN: Footsteps resounded on the linoleum.
MESSAGE.Translation: Footsteps resounded on the linoleum.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが角から顔を出していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san poked her head out from around the corner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san poked her head out from around the corner.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、来ヶ谷さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Kurugaya-sa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Kurugaya-sa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あのでかいのが犯人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That gorilla did it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That gorilla did it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人をびし、と指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: `先生@「井ノ原、おまえっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Inohara, you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Inohara, you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: さらに奥から担任教師。
MESSAGE.EN: From behind her came our homeroom teacher.
MESSAGE.Translation: From behind her came our homeroom teacher.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「は、はぁっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wh-what!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wh-what!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よし、そういうわけで行くぞ理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Alright, we can go now, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Alright, we can go now, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、行くってちょっとっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh-what, hold on!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh-what, hold on!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の手を掴むと、そのまま走り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She took my hand and started running.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took my hand and started running.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおおいどうなってんだよこれぇっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Heeey, what's going on!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Heeey, what's going on!❞

MESSAGE.JP: あああもうやっぱりこの人最悪だっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Aaah, she's the devil incarnate!
MESSAGE.Translation: Aaah, she's the devil incarnate!

MESSAGE.JP: …とか考えながら。
MESSAGE.EN: And while thinking that...
MESSAGE.Translation: And while thinking that...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の手を引く来ヶ谷さんを見て。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Kurugaya-san, who kept pulling my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Kurugaya-san, who kept pulling my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: こう思う。
MESSAGE.EN: And I thought to myself...
MESSAGE.Translation: And I thought to myself...

MESSAGE.JP: …『この人は、僕にはない強さを持っている』。
MESSAGE.EN: ...❛She has the strength that I don't.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ...❛She has the strength that I don't.❜

MESSAGE.JP: それを、僕はカッコいいと思ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought she looked cool.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought she looked cool.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、無事脱出と後始末は終了だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, I cleaned up my mess, and we're safe now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, I cleaned up my mess, and we're safe now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、可哀想でしょ真人が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you feel sorry for Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you feel sorry for Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 息を整えながら来ヶ谷さんに反論。
MESSAGE.EN: I objected to Kurugaya-san after regaining my breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: I objected to Kurugaya-san after regaining my breath.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんのほうはいたって平静だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san was perfectly calm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san was perfectly calm.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、まあちょっと無駄な時間を取らせてしまったな真人君には」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I did have to take up some of his time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I did have to take up some of his time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういう問題じゃないでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think that's the problem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think that's the problem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、気に病む必要もないと思うが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it's nothing to kill yourself over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it's nothing to kill yourself over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …まあ、来ヶ谷さんのことだから、ただ真人に罪をなすりつけただけじゃないとは思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, since it was Kurugaya-san, I knew she wouldn't have just pinned the crime on Masato...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, since it was Kurugaya-san, I knew she wouldn't have just pinned the crime on Masato...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ところでさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そろそろ手、離して欲しいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'd like you to let go of my hand already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'd like you to let go of my hand already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ずっと握られたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been holding my hand ever since then.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been holding my hand ever since then.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、これはすまん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, my bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, my bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手が離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She let go.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let go.

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: And that instant...
MESSAGE.Translation: And that instant...

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の膝が曲がる。
MESSAGE.EN: My knees buckled.
MESSAGE.Translation: My knees buckled.

MESSAGE.JP: …手に熱いほど、来ヶ谷さんの体温を感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The warmth of Kurugaya-san's hand enveloped mine again, feeling hot to my touch.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The warmth of Kurugaya-san's hand enveloped mine again, feeling hot to my touch.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何だキミは。離せといったりまた掴んだり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's with you, you tell me to let go and then grab my hand again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's with you, you tell me to let go and then grab my hand again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…少年？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Young man?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Young man?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い…や…」
だいじょうぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm okay.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm okay.

MESSAGE.JP: そう言おうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to tell her that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to tell her that.

MESSAGE.JP: …頭痛がする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But my head hurt too much.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But my head hurt too much.

MESSAGE.JP: 頭が万力で締め付けられているように、ギュウギュウと音を立てて軋む。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a pulsating pain, as if my head was in a vise.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a pulsating pain, as if my head was in a vise.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おい…どうしたんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hey... What's wrong!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hey... What's wrong!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: だいじょうぶ、へいき。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm okay, I'm fine.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm okay, I'm fine.

MESSAGE.JP: 口を動かそうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to move my lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to move my lips.

MESSAGE.JP: …体はその命令を聞かない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But my body was no longer listening to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But my body was no longer listening to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 視界が灰色になる。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision went gray.
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision went gray.

MESSAGE.JP: …暗転していく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Then everything was dark.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Then everything was dark.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: And I...
MESSAGE.Translation: And I...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…理樹君、しっかりしろっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Riki-kun, get a grip!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Riki-kun, get a grip!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんにもたれかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I leaned over on Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I leaned over on Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あはは…ホントに情けないや、僕…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Ahahaha... I'm just so pathetic...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Ahahaha... I'm just so pathetic...)

MESSAGE.JP: その思考を最後に、僕は闇に沈んでいった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was my last, fading thought before I was plunged into darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was my last, fading thought before I was plunged into darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（また…眠らなきゃいけないのか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Do I... have to sleep again, no matter what...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Do I... have to sleep again, no matter what...)

MESSAGE.JP: …頭痛は止まない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...My headache didn't end.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...My headache didn't end.

MESSAGE.JP: 夢を見ている間にも、万力は締め付け続けてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even while I was dreaming, the vise on my head kept tightening.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even while I was dreaming, the vise on my head kept tightening.

MESSAGE.JP: …暗闇だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、闇だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ一面の闇。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything was covered in darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything was covered in darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ちがうな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(No...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(No...)

MESSAGE.JP: 闇ですらない。闇は光がなければ存在しないものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't even darkness. Darkness only exists where there is light.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't even darkness. Darkness only exists where there is light.

MESSAGE.JP: ここはそう。
MESSAGE.EN: So, this was...
MESSAGE.Translation: So, this was...

MESSAGE.JP: 無だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, it was nothingness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, it was nothingness.

MESSAGE.JP: …僕は何も見ていないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wasn't seeing anything because there was nothing to see.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wasn't seeing anything because there was nothing to see.

MESSAGE.JP: それはある種の救いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And that felt like salvation to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that felt like salvation to me.

MESSAGE.JP: …頭痛だけは止まなかったけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Only my headache never ceased.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Only my headache never ceased.

MESSAGE.JP: けれどここでは、その頭痛だけが僕の存在を証明していた。
MESSAGE.EN: But here, that was the only proof of my existence.
MESSAGE.Translation: But here, that was the only proof of my existence.

MESSAGE.JP: 思考が息を吹き返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I could think again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could think again.

MESSAGE.JP: それに合わせて、体も僕の命令を聞くことを思い出したようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And my body finally seemed willing to listen to my orders again.
MESSAGE.Translation: And my body finally seemed willing to listen to my orders again.

MESSAGE.JP: 動く。
MESSAGE.EN: Move.
MESSAGE.Translation: Move.

MESSAGE.JP: 指は動く。
MESSAGE.EN: Move, my finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: Move, my finger.

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドのシーツを指が這う。
MESSAGE.EN: I traced my finger over a bed sheet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I traced my finger over a bed sheet.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ああ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Oh...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Oh...)

MESSAGE.JP: 眠りから覚めたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was roused from my slumber.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was roused from my slumber.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ベッド…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(A bed...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(A bed...)

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（どこのベッドだろう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(But whose...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(But whose...?)

MESSAGE.JP: そう思考が動き出すと同時に。
MESSAGE.EN: And with that thought...
MESSAGE.Translation: And with that thought...

MESSAGE.JP: …頬をなにかに突付かれている事に気付いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I realized that someone was poking my cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I realized that someone was poking my cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「うーむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …頬を抓まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And then pinching it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And then pinching it.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐりぐりと上下に動かされる。
MESSAGE.EN: Stretching it up and down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Stretching it up and down.

MESSAGE.JP: 鼻を抓まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Then my nose was pinched shut.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then my nose was pinched shut.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぷはぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Pwuhaa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Pwuhaa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口を開けて、空気を吸い込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my mouth, sucking in air.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my mouth, sucking in air.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おお、起きたか理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, you woke up, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, you woke up, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なっ…何てことするのさ!!　窒息死したらどうするんだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wha... What are you doing! What if I suffocated to death!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wha... What are you doing! What if I suffocated to death!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…前にも言っただろう。キミは死なないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I told you before. You won't die.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I told you before. You won't die.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「こんなことくらいで死んでたら、キミは今まで何回死んだんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you could die from just that, you'd have died a hundred times by now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you could die from just that, you'd have died a hundred times by now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いやまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …体を起こす。
MESSAGE.EN: I lifted my body up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lifted my body up.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ頭が少し軋む。
MESSAGE.EN: My head still hurt a bit.
MESSAGE.Translation: My head still hurt a bit.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…あらかじめ聞いておいてよかったよ、キミの持病」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm glad I heard of your chronic disease beforehand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm glad I heard of your chronic disease beforehand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まさか本当に突然倒れるとは思わなかったが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But I never thought you'd just collapse suddenly like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But I never thought you'd just collapse suddenly like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、別に心配することじゃないってのもわかってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So then, you know that it's nothing to worry about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So then, you know that it's nothing to worry about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あれだけ安らかそうに寝ていれば、いやでも心配しなくなるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You were sleeping so sweetly, I couldn't worry even if I wanted to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You were sleeping so sweetly, I couldn't worry even if I wanted to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …夢を見ていないからだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wonder if it was because I didn't have a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wonder if it was because I didn't have a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、そういえばここどこ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, so where am I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, so where am I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「女子寮の私の部屋だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝My room in the girls' dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝My room in the girls' dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「意識のないキミを、見つからないように運ぶのには苦労した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It was tough to carry you all the way here without anyone noticing, after you lost consciousness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It was tough to carry you all the way here without anyone noticing, after you lost consciousness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか、それは迷惑かけたね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see, sorry for the trouble...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see, sorry for the trouble...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って何でわざわざこっちに運ぶのさ!!　恭介にでも連絡して男子寮に運んでくれればよかったじゃない!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, why did you even carry me over here!? You could have asked Kyousuke or someone else and get me to the boys' dorm!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, why did you even carry me over here!? You could have asked Kyousuke or someone else and get me to the boys' dorm!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「面白そうだからに決まってるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Because it seemed like fun, why else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Because it seemed like fun, why else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「面白そうでこんな事しないでよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't do something like that just because it seems like fun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't do something like that just because it seems like fun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ。その反応が見たかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, that's the kind of reaction I wanted to see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, that's the kind of reaction I wanted to see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああもう…なんでこんなことに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Geez... Why did this have to happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Geez... Why did this have to happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…これは異なことを。女子寮に招かれるチャンスなどそうはないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What are you saying? It's a rare chance to see what it's like in the girls' dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What are you saying? It's a rare chance to see what it's like in the girls' dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうやって帰るのさ！　こんな遅くに見つかったら、みっちり怒られた上に一生変態扱いだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How do I go back now! If they find me at this late hour, I'll be punished and will be treated as a pervert for the rest of my life!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How do I go back now! If they find me at this late hour, I'll be punished and will be treated as a pervert for the rest of my life!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いいじゃないか、変態様変態様と崇められつつ学園生活を過ごしていけば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Why not, you'll be revered and worshipped as the Lord of Perversion for the rest of your school life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why not, you'll be revered and worshipped as the Lord of Perversion for the rest of your school life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「絶対嫌だよっ!!　ていうかそんなの崇める人いないよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No thanks! Besides, what kind of worship is that!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No thanks! Besides, what kind of worship is that!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「騒ぐと見つかるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Be that loud, and you'll be found out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Be that loud, and you'll be found out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あぁぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、後でこっそり窓から出て行くがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, just sneak out through the window later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, just sneak out through the window later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ここは１階だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝We're on the first floor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝We're on the first floor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とはいっても、もうすっかり日は沈んでしまったらしく、外はすでに薄暗い。
MESSAGE.EN: The sun had set long ago and it was pitch black outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sun had set long ago and it was pitch black outside.

MESSAGE.JP: …今すぐ出てってもだいじょうぶそうだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I could escape whenever I wanted.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I could escape whenever I wanted.

MESSAGE.JP: しかし、ここが来ヶ谷さんの部屋かぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: So, this was Kurugaya-san's room?
MESSAGE.Translation: So, this was Kurugaya-san's room?

MESSAGE.JP: 思わずきょろきょろと部屋の中を見回してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I found myself instinctively looking around, inspecting this and that in her room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found myself instinctively looking around, inspecting this and that in her room.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん、どうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「下着類ならそこのタンスの中だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you're looking for my underwear, it's in the dresser over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you're looking for my underwear, it's in the dresser over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやなんで下着なのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, why underwear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, why underwear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「欲しいんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you want some?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Don't you want some?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ一枚くらいなら持っていって構わんぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't mind if you take a pair with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't mind if you take a pair with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「夜な夜な私の下着で色々しながら、ふごふご鼻を鳴らしてうへへへとか言うといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You'll do all sort of things with my underwear every night, going ❛Uhehehe❜ while sniffing it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You'll do all sort of things with my underwear every night, going ❛Uhehehe❜ while sniffing it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「毎回毎回僕を変態みたいに扱わないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you treating me like a pervert every single time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you treating me like a pervert every single time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「割と一般論で語っているつもりだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I was under the impression that that's what the whole general populace would do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I was under the impression that that's what the whole general populace would do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなのが一般な世の中に生きていたくないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't want to live in a world where the general populace would do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't want to live in a world where the general populace would do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …来ヶ谷さんの中では一般的な人間、というのはすべて変態なのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: For Kurugaya-san, I suppose, every normal person was a pervert...
MESSAGE.Translation: For Kurugaya-san, I suppose, every normal person was a pervert...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ冗談はさておき、何だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's enough joking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, that's enough joking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん…ここホントは男子寮って事はないよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, but... this isn't really the boys' dorm, is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, but... this isn't really the boys' dorm, is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「間違いなく女子寮だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Without a shade of doubt, it's the girls' dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Without a shade of doubt, it's the girls' dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか僕の部屋とほとんど変わらない気がするんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I feel like it's not that much different from my room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I feel like it's not that much different from my room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それはそうだろう。家具の配置などほとんどいじり様もないし、そもそも私はあまり飾り気などない人間だしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's only natural. I've barely touched the furniture, and I'm not the kind of person to decorate my room anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's only natural. I've barely touched the furniture, and I'm not the kind of person to decorate my room anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふうん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも、なんか、匂いが来ヶ谷さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, it kind of had her smell.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, it kind of had her smell.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人と一緒の汗臭い僕たちの部屋に比べたら、ほのかにさわやかというか。
MESSAGE.EN: It was subtle and refreshing compared to my room that only reeked of Masato's and my sweat.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was subtle and refreshing compared to my room that only reeked of Masato's and my sweat.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それで、もうだいじょうぶなのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So, are you okay now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So, are you okay now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん。それはもう平気」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yep. I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yep. I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …頭痛はまだ治まりきってはいないけど、これはもうすぐ消えるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My head still hurt a bit, but the pain would be gone in no time.
MESSAGE.Translation: My head still hurt a bit, but the pain would be gone in no time.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「またしても密室で二人っきりなわけだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Once again we're alone in a room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Once again we're alone in a room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ…そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, well... That's true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, well... That's true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: またこの人は…。
MESSAGE.EN: There she goes... again...
MESSAGE.Translation: There she goes... again...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: やばい、なんか妙に来ヶ谷さんを意識してるっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: This is bad, I'm becoming too aware of her presence!
MESSAGE.Translation: This is bad, I'm becoming too aware of her presence!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あのさ、僕やっぱもう帰るよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-hey, I think I'll be going now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-hey, I think I'll be going now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何だ突然」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Why so suddenly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why so suddenly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、だいじょうぶだからさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm okay now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm okay now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は立ち上がり、窓のほうへ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I got to my feet and headed for the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got to my feet and headed for the window.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「理樹君？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「スマン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「靴が玄関に置きっ放しだ」
